hadiths.text: It was narrated form Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah said:" There has come to you Ramadan in which the gates of Paradise are opened, the gates of the fire are closed and the devils are chained up." (Sahih) Abu 'Abdur-Rahman said: this narration is a mistake

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى الزُّهْرِيِّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning Different Reports From Az-Zuhri Concerning That
